languages.text: "Каждый раз, как тебя вижу, рука к оружию тянется. Ничего личного, просто не привыкну, что ведьме дозволено жить".
"Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal — I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."
languages.original_text: "Каждый раз, как тебя вижу, рука к оружию тянется. Ничего личного, просто не привыкну, что ведьме дозволено жить".

traits.locale_text: "Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal, I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."
"Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal, I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."
"Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal, I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."
"Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal — I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."
"Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal — I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."

languages.text: 「お前の顔を見るたびに、自然と手が武器に伸びる。個人的な感情ではない。ただ、魔女が生かされているという事実が、どうしても理解できないだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal — I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の顔を見るたびに、自然と手が武器に伸びる。個人的な感情ではない。ただ、魔女が生かされているという事実が、どうしても理解できないだけだ」

languages.text: "Jedes Mal, wenn ich Euch sehe, greift meine Hand nach meiner Waffe. Es ist nichts Persönliches, ich werde nur ewig erstaunt sein, dass einer Hexe zu leben gestattet wird."
languages.original_text: "Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal — I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."

traits.locale_text: "Jedes Mal, wenn ich Euch sehe, greift meine Hand nach meiner Waffe. Es ist nichts Persönliches, ich werde nur ewig erstaunt sein, dass einer Hexe zu leben gestattet wird."

languages.text: « Chaque fois que je vous vois, je ne peux pas m'empêcher de tendre la main vers mon arme. N'y voyez rien de personnel ; je ne comprends tout simplement pas que l'on puisse permettre à une sorcière de vivre. »
languages.original_text: "Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal — I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque fois que je vous vois, je ne peux pas m'empêcher de tendre la main vers mon arme. N'y voyez rien de personnel ; je ne comprends tout simplement pas que l'on puisse permettre à une sorcière de vivre. »

languages.text: «Cada vez que la veo, me dan ganas de echar mano de mi arma. No es nada personal; es que jamás entenderé por qué se perdona la vida a una bruja».
languages.original_text: "Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal — I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."

traits.locale_text: «Cada vez que la veo, me dan ganas de echar mano de mi arma. No es nada personal; es que jamás entenderé por qué se perdona la vida a una bruja».

languages.text: “每当我看到你的时候，我都不自觉想要去拿武器。这并不是针对你，只是每次看到活着的女巫，我都会非常惊讶。”
languages.original_text: "Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal — I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."

traits.locale_text: “每当我看到你的时候，我都不自觉想要去拿武器。这并不是针对你，只是每次看到活着的女巫，我都会非常惊讶。”

languages.text: "Seni her görüşümde elim silahıma gidiyor. Kişisel algılama, her gün canı bağışlanmış bir cadı görmek zor."
languages.original_text: "Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal — I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."

traits.locale_text: "Seni her görüşümde elim silahıma gidiyor. Kişisel algılama, her gün canı bağışlanmış bir cadı görmek zor."

languages.original_text: "Every time I see you, my hand reaches for my weapon. It's nothing personal — I will forever be astounded that a witch is allowed to live."
